titleStmt.title: A letter to General Monck, in answer to his of the 23th of January, directed to Mr. Rolle, to be communicated to the gentlemen of the county of Devon· By one of the excluded Members of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Morris, Richard, fl. 1660.
Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Lowndes, at the White Lyon in S. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: R.M., i.e. Richard Morris.
A reply to: A letter of General George Monck's, dated at Leicester 23 Jan. and directed unto Mr. Rolle to be communicated unto the rest of the gentry of Devon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the White Lyon in S. Paul's Church-yard
